location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 28 to Lieutenant Jonathan Swift, in Command of the SuccessKetch, from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: A slim portion of text is missing on the right-hand side of Page 21.

mods.abstract: The letter is a short note ordering Swift to sail to Bussora [Basra] with the accompanying packet and once there, to follow orders from Bussora.
